scripts.scss-blocks: node-sass -o dist/css/blocks/alerts src/scss/blocks/alerts/editor.scss --source-map=true && node-sass -o dist/css/blocks/alerts src/scss/blocks/alerts/block.scss --source-map=true
scripts.scss: npm run scss-main && npm run scss-blocks
scripts.cssmin-blocks: cleancss -o dist/css/blocks/alerts/editor.min.css dist/css/blocks/alerts/editor.css && cleancss -o dist/css/blocks/alerts/block.min.css dist/css/blocks/alerts/block.css
scripts.cssmin: npm run cssmin-main && npm run cssmin-blocks
scripts.uglify: npm run uglify-main && npm run uglify-blocks
scripts.build:css: npm run scss && npm run cssmin
scripts.build:js: npm run webpack && npm run uglify
scripts.build: npm run build:css && npm run build:js
